review: We have had nothing but disappointment with the fire stick. While all other devices connect to the internet fine in our home, this never maintains a connection for long enough to do anything. By the time we browse for a couple minutes, the connection is lost. We try and try again, get reconnected, only for the fire stick to lose connection again. We restarted everything, reset the router, tried different hdmi ports... I think the item just doesn't work. I tried contacting customer service, it a too late for me to return the item, but have yet to get a resolution. Very disappointed. Perhaps we will get an additional Apple TV or Roku.

review: I like it, however, it does not offer the same options and easy accessibility as the netflix homepage does on the computer.
